task_1_project_structure.task_description: Set up the project structure and game framework - Create foundational HTML5 game structure with canvas, CSS, main game loop, asset manager, and basic file structure

task_9_game_states.task_description: TASK 9: Build game states and UI systems - Create game flow and interface: start screen with arcade attract mode, ready message, pause functionality, game over screen, level transitions, lives display, level indicator, settings menu, instructions screen, credits screen

task_6_power_system.task_description: Create power-up and ghost vulnerability system - Timer-based ghost vulnerability, blue/white flashing frightened ghosts, reversed movement, points for eating ghosts, ghost eyes returning, power-up duration decreases, warning flash, sound cues

task_7_visual_effects.task_description: TASK 7: Develop visual effects and animations - Pixel-perfect sprite animations, classic arcade color palette, smooth movement interpolation, death animations, ghost animation states, particle effects, screen flash effects, CRT overlay, and attract mode demo

task_5_ghost_ai.task_description: TASK 5: Build ghost AI with unique behaviors - Implement four classic ghost personalities (Blinky, Pinky, Inky, Clyde), scatter/chase/frightened modes, pathfinding algorithm, and ghost house exit logic

task_2_maze_system.task_description: TASK 2: Implement maze generation and rendering system - Create maze data structure (2D array), classic Pac-Man maze layout, maze rendering with walls/paths, dot and power pellet placement, tunnel/warp zones, ghost house in center, optimize rendering for performance

task_10_documentation.task_description: TASK 10: Create comprehensive game documentation - Generate detailed GAME_README.md with installation, gameplay, customization guide, code structure, enhancements, and troubleshooting
